name: Biowar 3: Survivor
description:
The apocalypse started again. You must reach the volcano, to activate a beacon that will reflect on the satellite, but it suddenly errupts. Your objective from the start is to kill Covesko. (the creator of zombies, which also appears in Survivor).

Make it quick to the end, and try not to die!

WARNING! The game contains blood and gore, and is hardcore mode (1 try only).

The game has now multiple environments:

Lush(Used until level Cold Beak)

Ice(Used in level Cold Beak)

Wasteland(Used in level Curse of Hell)

Shimmer(Used in level The Last Man)

Sandstorm(Used in level Road to Psandenmut, The Canyon and End of Time)

FULL RELEASE DATE: TBA

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE: There are 3 secrets hidden in the whole game

Secret 1 (in level Cold Peak): RESISTANCE BASE

Secret 2 (in level Road to Psandenmut): PEACE SIGN

Secret 3 (in level End of Time): KEEP OUT SIGN
